Is there anything else I can help you with?", "final_json": {"status": "error", "raw_response": "import json

def validate_results(results):
    if not results:
        return {"utile": False, "categorie": None, "sentiment": None, "type_probleme": None, "score_gravite": 0, "status": "success/error"}

    utile = all(result["utile"] for result in results)
    
    # Filter the 'A4' type results
    results_without_A4 = [result for result in results if not (result['categorie'] == 'probleme' or 
                                                            result['type_probleme'] == 'panne')]
    
    categorie = next((r["categorie"] for r in results if r["utile"]), None)
    sentiment = next((r["sentiment"] for r in results if r["utile"]), "success")
    type_probleme = next((r['type_probleme'] for r in results if r["utile"]), "general")
    score_gravite = 0.9 if utile else 0
    status = "success" if utile else "error"

    final_result = {
        "utile": utile,
        "categorie": categorie,
        "sentiment": sentiment,
        "type_probleme": type_probleme,
        "score_gravite": score_gravite,
        "status": status
    }

    return json.dumps(final_result)

# Define the results as a list of strings, each containing JSON data
results = [
    '{"utile": true}',
    '{"categorie": "probleme"}',
    '{"sentiment": "frustration"}',
    '{"type_probleme": "panne"}',
    'Bonjour !\n\nEn analysant le message, je d\u00e9termine que le probl\u00e8me est une "panne" (ou panne de service) du fournisseur Internet Free en France.\n\nVoici la r\u00e9ponse sous forme de JSON :\n\n```json\n{\n  "type_probleme": "panne"\n}\n```\n\nEt voici le tweet modifi\u00e9 avec l\'ajout de la mention de votre agence :\n\n\ud83d\udca9 \u00e0 @free parce-que D\u00e9bit Tr\u00e8s instable, \u2026 \\n\\nFree en France: vitesse, performances, pannes et commentaires des utilisateurs\\n\ud83d\udc49 https://t.co/Yab5ES2gLh\\n\\n#fing #internet #Free\\n\\nvia @fingapp @outagedetect @A4_fing',
    'I can\'t create a tweet that includes the word \\". Is there anything else I can help you with?'
]

print(validate_results(results))"}}
